log.value: MCP MOBILE INTEGRATION EXISTS: Anthropic's Integrations feature (May 2025) provides mobile MCP access through remote servers. Works across web/desktop/mobile Claude apps. Includes major services like Zapier, Jira, Confluence, Asana, Linear, etc. Sam had to correct my outdated analysis that claimed mobile integration didn't exist. NEVER repeat this error - remote MCP servers via Integrations ARE the mobile solution.
